azurerm_bot_channel_slack.description: Manages a Slack integration for a Bot Channel

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the Bot Channel. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

location.description: The supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

bot_name.description: The name of the Bot Resource this channel will be associated with. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

client_id.description: The Client ID that will be used to authenticate with Slack.

client_secret.description: The Client Secret that will be used to authenticate with Slack.

verification_token.description: The Verification Token that will be used to authenticate with Slack.

id.description: The ID of the Slack Integration for a Bot Channel.

create.description: Used when creating the Slack Integration for a Bot Channel.

update.description: Used when updating the Slack Integration for a Bot Channel.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Slack Integration for a Bot Channel.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Slack Integration for a Bot Channel.
